overview.title: Ultra Elegant, compact design
overview.text: Huawei Honor 3 has an elegant design and is made from high-quality plastics. Despite the large screen size, the phone is comfortable to hold in hand.

overview.title: 4.7 " Display size
overview.text: Retina display with 4.7 inches size and HD (720x1280) resolution for video, gaming and Internet browsing.

overview.title: Water and Dust resistance
overview.text: Huawei Honor 3 is certified according to IP57 standard for protection from dust and water. The phone survives up to 1m immertion in water for no more than 30 minutes.

overview.title: Great shot in low-light
overview.text: Two cameras 13.1MP and 1.3 MP. Full HD video recording by main camera and HD recording by front camera.

specification.title: Display
text: IP57 certified - dust and water resistant
Water resistant up to 1 meter and 30 minutes

text: Micro SD Card up to 32 GB
